metadata.raw:
Silver Star Class Passenger Liner (Civilian Starship)

The Silver Star and its sister ships are owned and operated by the Argentia Line, which is active primarily from Trin to Glisten. Argentia vessels are famed for their luxurious accommodations, and gourmet meals. The company also runs the chain of Argentia Hotels, found in most A and B class starports in the two subsectors.

CraftID: Silver Star class Passenger Liner, TL15, MCr1421.64
